Package com.c195project.c195project.controller

Class Scheduler

java.lang.Object
com.c195project.c195project.controller.Scheduler
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class Scheduler extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The controller for interaction between Appointment.java, AppointmentDAO.java and Scheduler.fxml.
Author:
Blake Ramsey

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This method initializes the Scheduler controller after root element has been processed.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - Resolves relative paths for root object, or null if location is not known.
      resourceBundle - Resources used to localize root object, or null if root object was not localized.

    • onAppointmentAddButtonClick

      public void onAppointmentAddButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method uses the windowLoader method in order to direct the user to the Add Appointment window. This method assigns 'true' to the addButtonClicked boolean.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The actionEvent is clicking on the Add Appointment Button.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onAppointmentUpdateButtonClick

      public void onAppointmentUpdateButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method uses the windowLoader method in order to direct the user to the Update Appointment window. This method assigns 'false' to the addButtonClicked boolean. This method assigns an Appointment object to appointmentSelected, and passes this to the next window. If no appointment is selected, error is thrown.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The actionEvent is clicking on the Update Appointment Button.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onAppointmentDeleteButtonClick

      public void onAppointmentDeleteButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws Exception
      This method is to delete selected appointment. Confirmation alert pops up to make sure appointment should be deleted. Information alert populates after appointment is deleted to inform of deletion details.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The actionEvent is the Delete button being clicked.
      Throws:
      Exception

    • onBackClick

      public void onBackClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method uses the windowLoader method to take the user back to the Customer page.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The actionEvent is the Back button being clicked.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onWeekClick

      public void onWeekClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      This method filters appointments by week (the next 7 days). For example, if clicked on a Thursday, it would show appointments through the following Thursday. This method accounts for if specific customer appointments are showing, and filters accordingly.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The actionEvent is the weekRadioButton being clicked.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • onMonthClick

      public void onMonthClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      This method filters appointments by month, and shows any remaining appointments for that month. This method accounts for if specific customer appointments are showing, and filters accordingly.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The actionEvent is the monthRadioButton being clicked.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • onAllClicked

      public void onAllClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method shows all appointments. This method accounts for if specific customer appointments are showing, and filters accordingly.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The actionEvent is the showAllRadioButton being clicked.

    • onUpdateTimeClick

      public void onUpdateTimeClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method utilizes the windowLoader method in order to send the user to the UpdateAppointmentTime window. If appointment selection is made then an appropriate error is thrown.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The actionEvent is the updateTimeButton being clicked.

    • onCountButtonClick

      public void onCountButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      This method returns a count of total appointments (not filtered by customer) which contain a specified type or fall inside a specified month. The user enters the month (i.e. Jan / 01 / 1) or the type of appointment in order to filter results.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The actionEvent is the countButton being clicked.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • onContactClick

      public void onContactClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      This method uses a combobox in order to filter appointments by Contact. This method additionally filters by contact for each customer selected.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The actionEvent is a contactComboBox selection being made.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • onShowAllButtonClick

      public void onShowAllButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      This method shows all appointments or all appointments for selected customer.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The actionEvent is the showAllButton being clicked.
      Throws:
      SQLException
